alert.note: Alert for Phillips; Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 2:02PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Rooks and southwestern Phillips Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 201 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Stockton, or 26 miles south of Phillipsburg, moving northwest at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stockton, Logan, Woodston, Speed and Webster State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. If on or near Webster Lake, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
